Package org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.qptl2ba

Class PastAutomaton

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.tran.qptl2ba.PastAutomaton
public class PastAutomaton
extends java.lang.Object
This class is intended to construct a classic finite state automaton for a past LTL formula (or past QPTL formula in prenex normal form) such that a word is accepted by the automaton if and only if the reverse of the word end-satisfies the formula.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PastAutomaton​(LTL f)
    Constructs this object with a past LTL formula

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void applyExists​(Proposition prop)
    Project out a proposition from the internal classic finite state automaton.
    void applyForall​(Proposition prop)
    Applies forall operator to the internal classic finite state automaton.
    TwoWayAltAutomaton applyGuarantee()
    Returns a two-way alternating automaton by applying the sometime operator (<>) to the internal classic finite state automaton.
    TwoWayAltAutomaton applyNext()
    Returns a two-way alternating automaton by applying the next operator ( ()) to the internal classic finite state automaton.
    TwoWayAltAutomaton applyPersistence()
    Returns a two-way alternating automaton by applying the eventually always operator (<>[]) to the internal classic finite state automaton.
    TwoWayAltAutomaton applyRecurrence()
    Returns a two-way alternating automaton by applying the infinitely-often operator ([]<>) to the internal classic finite state automaton.
    TwoWayAltAutomaton applySafety()
    Returns a two-way alternating automaton by applying the always operator ( []) to the internal classic finite state automaton.
    void complement()
    Complements the internal classic finite state automaton.
    FSA getAutomaton()
    Returns the internal classic finite state automaton of this object.
    void minimize()
    Minimizes the internal classic finite state automaton.
